detail_desc: Top in slub-weave viscose with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Fabric cap with elastication at the back.
Oversized jumper in a soft knit with a deep V-neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a rib-knit cotton blend with a small, overlocked collar, short sleeves, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and zipped side pockets. Unlined.
Wide-fitting top in sweatshirt fabric with a deep cut-out section at the back, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in an airy crinkled weave with lace details, a small frilled collar, and concealed buttons and sewn-in pin-tucks at the front. Long sleeves with buttons and frills at the cuffs. Unlined.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Knee-length satin dress with flounce details, a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps, short sleeves and a zip in the side. Unlined.
Small weekend bag in woven fabric with a zip and two handles at the top, an adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 12x35x42 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist and straight, wide legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and narrow hems.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Necklaces in various lengths and designs. Adjustable length 33-41.5 cm, 39-46.5 cm and 41-48.5 cm.
Fitted body in ribbed jersey with a stand-up collar, long raglan sleeves and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist.
V-neck jersey top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and hole-patterned trims around the neckline and down the front and back. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Wide shorts in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, ties at the front and patch front pockets.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
5-pocket trousers in patterned stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Trousers with an elasticated waist.
Parka woven in a modal blend with a soft, brushed finish. Hood, diagonal zip down the front, a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and long sleeves with a tab and button. Unlined.
Cropped top in jersey containing glittery threads with narrow shoulder straps.
Metal keyring with an imitation leather strap and small carabiner hook with a charm. Detachable strap with a metal clip lock. Total length 50 cm.
Tube scarf in soft, fine-knit wool.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft washed cotton twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and welt side pockets. Lined.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and visible elastication at the hem.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft cotton jersey with a collar, slits in the sides and no buttons.

Knee-length dress in a cotton and viscose weave with broderie anglaise. Scalloped V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, seam with a lace band at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Jersey lining.
Hat in a soft, textured-knit wool blend with a thermal fleece trim on the inside.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.
Sleeveless lace top in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps that are lace-covered at the back. Low-cut back and ties at the back of the neck. Jersey-lined front.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Shirt in a textured cotton weave with a grandad collar, open chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Yoke at the back and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, airy jersey.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, decorative seams and asymmetric, raw-edge hems.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Semi shiny tights with a high waist and a shaping effect on the tummy, waist and thighs. 100 denier.

Shirt dress in a soft cotton weave with a button placket and a braided, detachable belt in imitation suede with a metal buckle. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Sleeveless, padded dinosaur fancy dress costume with a hook and loop fastening at the back, long legs with elasticated hems and a detachable tail.
Boxy top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text print, ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy, textured jersey with a lace band at the waist, concealed zip at the back and flared skirt with lace bands at the hem.
Cotton twill shorts with an adjustable elasticated waist, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and a zip fly with a button.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton and linen blend with a concealed button-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.
Hooded top in printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Dungaree shorts in washed, stretch denim with adjustable straps, press-studs at the sides, a chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets.
Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, pattern-knit organic cotton with straps that cross and fasten at the back with adjustable buttoning, and ribbed hems.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Dress in soft viscose jersey with a wide neckline and short cap sleeves.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Fitted, calf-length skirt in sequined jersey with a high, elasticated waist and a slit at one side.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Ballet pumps in shimmering imitation leather with a strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles.
Lined bandeau bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Lacing at the back.
Straight-style top in soft jersey overlayered with lace. Round neckline with a discreet zip at the back.
Sleeveless tulle dress with a sequin-embroidered lace bodice, and a zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt in several asymmetric, layered tiers. Lined.
Slightly longer jumper knitted in tape yarn with a slight sheen. V-neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in sturdy, textured jersey with a shawl collar, yoke at the back, detachable tie belt and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbed neckline.
Trainers with lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a padded heel and tongue. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbed trim around the neckline.

Pyjamas with a top and short shorts in soft, ribbed jersey. Top with a round, ribbed neckline, long sleeves and an embroidered motif at the top. Shorts with an elasticated waist. Overlocked edges at the cuffs and hems.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Multi-strand bracelet in imitation leather with a magnetic metal fastener.
Lined chinos in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, and a fake welt pocket with a decorative button at the back.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck top in stretch viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Straight-cut hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif and sequins on the front, and a gently rounded hem.

Sporty jacket in sturdy jersey with a zip down the front and a mesh-lined hood with an elastic drawstring. Chest pocket with a concealed zip, side pockets, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem.
Short shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and colourful side stripes.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
